document.full_text: japanese chipmaker elpida memory inc said on monday it expected no interruptions to its product supply following the catastrophic march 11 earthquake and tsunami, which triggered a nuclear safety crisis and rolling power blackouts.
document.title: elpida says expects no supply interruptions following quake
lines_and_colors: japanese chipmaker elpida memory inc said on monday it expected no interruptions to its product supply following the catastrophic march 11 earthquake and tsunami, which triggered a nuclear safety crisis and rolling power blackouts.
